short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect the page, choose what you need to inspect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspector on Acids: Simplify HTML and CSS Inspection

Inspect and customize web pages effortlessly! With Inspector on Acids, you can quickly inspect the CSS properties of any HTML element, displayed in an intuitive tooltip that follows your mouse.

Key Features:
- Real-Time CSS Inspection: Hover over any element to instantly view its CSS properties in a sleek tooltip.
- Customizable Display: Choose which properties to display and personalize your inspection experience via the options page.
- Highlight Elements: Toggle element highlighting on or off for better visibility.
- Seamless Interaction: Easily activate or deactivate the tool by clicking the icon or pressing the ESC key.

How to Use:
Click on the Inspector on Acids icon in your browser toolbar.
Hover your mouse over elements to see their properties.
Disable the tool by pressing ESC or clicking the icon again.

Customize Your Tooltip:
Right-click the plugin icon in the toolbar.
Select "Options" to configure which CSS properties appear in the tooltip.
Simplify your workflow and gain deeper insights into web design with Inspector on Acids. Perfect for developers, designers, and anyone who loves tweaking web pages!

for any bug/suggestion/feedback please feel free to contact me
